data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_ff4de3b0aabd1d2f6e184db1c831f6a9.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Scripture of the Moon Elf slowly charges Estes with energy. When the energy reaches 100 stacks, Estes' next Basic Attack will become enhanced, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the target and 125<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+75% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, and slowing them by 60% for 1.5s.

Estes restores 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+110% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to the target allied hero immediately and links himself with them for 3s, slowly restoring 325<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to the target. Linking with an allied hero will also increase Estes' Hybrid Defense by 20 and Movement Speed by 15%, as well as the energy charging speed of the Scripture of the Moon Elf.

Being too far from the target will break the link.

Estes drops a flood of moonlight on the target area, dealing 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+70% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemy units within it. Afterwards, it turns to a domain of the Moon Goddess and reveals enemies inside it. Enemies will be slowed by 90% for 1.5s if they touch the edge of the domain area. (The slow effect will decay over time.)

Estes casts an enhanced <font color="a6aafb">"Moonlight Immersion"</font> on all nearby allied heroes. Within the next 8s, <font color="a6aafb">"Moonlight Immersion"</font> will be enhanced and Estes will continuously recover 1230<font color="62f8fe"> (+210% Total Magic Power)</font> HP.

data.name: Estes

__data.skilldesc: Summon a Healing Spring that surrounds the hero and lasts 4s, restoring 2.5% Max HP every 0.4s to affected allied heroes (including self), and increasing <font color="62f8fe">Shield and HP Regen</font> effects received by 25% (this effect cannot stack).
__data.skilldesc_text: Summon a Healing Spring that surrounds the hero and lasts <Num3>s, restoring <%Num2> Max HP every <Num1>s to affected allied heroes (including self), and increasing [C2Shield and HP Regen] effects received by <%Num4> (this effect cannot stack).
__data.skilldescemblem: Summon a Healing Spring that surrounds the hero and lasts 4s, restoring 2.5% Max HP every 0.4s to affected allied heroes (including self), and increasing <font color="62f8fe">Shield and HP Regen</font> effects received by 25% (this effect cannot stack).

recommendmasterplan.description: Roaming: Continuous HP Regen with CD Reduction equipment.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+12% Healing Effect
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+6% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by <%Num1> for <Num2>s.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Passive - Favor:
equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskill6: Mysticism: Getting a kill or assist on an enemy Minion will restore 4% Mana. (An assist occurs when a Minion dies within 2s after taking damage from the hero.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Favor: 
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
Mysticism: Getting a kill or assist on an enemy Minion will restore 4% Mana. (An assist occurs when a Minion dies within 2s after taking damage from the hero.)
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+10 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equiptips:
+12% Healing Effect
+60 Magic Power
+300 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+15% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+920 Extra Max HP
+40 Extra Physical Defense
+4 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

__data.skilldescemblem: Summon a Healing Spring that surrounds the hero and lasts 4s, restoring 2.5% Max HP every 0.4s to affected allied heroes (including self), and increasing <font color="62f8fe">Shield and HP Regen</font> effects received by 25% (this effect cannot stack).

recommendmasterplan.description: Roaming: Continuous HP Regen with CD Reduction equipment.

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by <%Num1> for <Num2>s.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Passive - Favor:
equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskill6: Mysticism: Getting a kill or assist on an enemy Minion will restore 4% Mana. (An assist occurs when a Minion dies within 2s after taking damage from the hero.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Favor: 
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
Mysticism: Getting a kill or assist on an enemy Minion will restore 4% Mana. (An assist occurs when a Minion dies within 2s after taking damage from the hero.)
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+10 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equiptips:
+12% Healing Effect
+60 Magic Power
+300 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+15% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Deter: When hit by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Damage by 6% for 2s (this effect stacks up to 3 times).
equiplist.equiptips:
+920 Extra Max HP
+40 Extra Physical Defense
+4 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

recommendmasterplan.name: Fire Flux Esports APEX47
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Elf King who rules the Moon Elves.

assist.desc: Estes works best with typical Marksman heroes, his healing will allow them to deal more damage. Heroes like Lesley and Hanabi are good examples here.

strong.desc: Estes counters heroes with no burst damage, he can easily heal through minor damages from heroes like Faramis and Alice.

weak.desc: Estes is countered by heroes with high burst damage. Heroes like Saber and Eudora can easily burst down Estes or the hero he protects in a few seconds.
